com.cmt3319.game
Class MainMenuScreen

java.lang.Object
  com.cmt3319.interfaces.Screen
      com.cmt3319.game.MainMenuScreen

public class MainMenuScreen
extends com.cmt3319.interfaces.Screen

First visible screen, provides users with a number of options including: play game (loads GamePlayScreen, High scores (loads HighscoreScreen), and help (loads HelpScreenOne). Provides ability to toggle audio by invoking Settings.setSoundEnabled(boolean). Uses CloudManager and an instance of Player to provide an interactive background. Extends Screen.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Robert Wells

Constructor Detail

MainMenuScreen

public MainMenuScreen(com.cmt3319.interfaces.Game game)
Initialises play, highscore, help, title, and audio on/off images and positions. Audio image is dependent on Settings.isSoundEnabled().Initialises CloudManager and Player.

Method Detail

playSelectedSound

private void playSelectedSound()

update

public void update(float deltaTime)
Updates cloud manager CloudManager.update(float), which moves clouds across screen, updates player Player.update(float), which also moves player across screen, checks if player is still visible, and if it isn't, it sets player back to start position. Lastly handles touch events for play, high scores, help screen, and audio on/off.
